member.name: HTTP_CACHE_POLICY_TYPE
member.summary: TheHTTP_CACHE_POLICY_TYPE enumeration type defines available cache policies. It is used to restrict the values of the Policy member of the structure, which in turn is used in the pCachePolicy parameter of the function to specify how a response fragment is cached.

member.name: HTTP_CACHE_POLICY_TYPE.HttpCachePolicyNocache
member.summary: Do not cache this value at all.

member.name: HTTP_CACHE_POLICY_TYPE.HttpCachePolicyUserInvalidates
member.summary: Cache this value until the user provides a different one.

member.name: HTTP_CACHE_POLICY_TYPE.HttpCachePolicyTimeToLive
member.summary: Cache this value for a specified time and then remove it from the cache.

member.name: HTTP_CACHE_POLICY_TYPE.HttpCachePolicyMaximum
member.summary: Terminates the enumeration; not used to determine policy.
